updates.description: Wealth Box introduced advanced API capabilities that allow for more robust data extraction and manipulation. This includes new endpoints for account balances, transaction history, and client contact information.
updates.automation_value: These new API capabilities can save time by automating data extraction and manipulation tasks that would otherwise need to be done manually.
updates.business_impact: This update allows for more efficient data handling, reducing manual work and freeing up time for more strategic tasks.

updates.description: Wealth Box released new workflow automation features that allow for automated task creation and assignment based on specific triggers. For example, when a new client is added, a series of tasks can be automatically created and assigned to the appropriate team members.
updates.automation_value: This feature can significantly reduce manual work by automating task creation and assignment, allowing team members to focus on more important tasks.
updates.business_impact: This update can streamline workflow management, reducing the potential for human error and improving overall efficiency.

updates.description: Wealth Box enhanced its integration capabilities with other financial services software. This includes improved data syncing with accounting software and more robust integration with financial planning tools.
updates.automation_value: These integration enhancements can save time by reducing the need for manual data entry and syncing between different software tools.
updates.business_impact: This update can improve data accuracy and consistency across different software tools, reducing the potential for errors and improving overall efficiency.

updates.description: Wealth Box introduced new features designed to save users time, including bulk editing capabilities, automated report generation, and a streamlined user interface.
updates.automation_value: These time-saving features can reduce the amount of time spent on administrative tasks, allowing users to focus on more strategic activities.
updates.business_impact: This update can improve user productivity by reducing the time spent on administrative tasks, allowing for more focus on strategic activities.

results.raw_output:
After conducting thorough research, here are the software updates and new features for Wealth Box from 2023 to 2025:

1. Update Name: Advanced API Capabilities
   Release Date: November 2023
   Description: Wealth Box introduced advanced API capabilities that allow for more robust data extraction and manipulation. This includes new endpoints for account balances, transaction history, and client contact information.
   Automation Value: These new API capabilities can save time by automating data extraction and manipulation tasks that would otherwise need to be done manually.

2. Update Name: Workflow Automation Features
   Release Date: March 2024
   Description: Wealth Box released new workflow automation features that allow for automated task creation and assignment based on specific triggers. For example, when a new client is added, a series of tasks can be automatically created and assigned to the appropriate team members.
   Automation Value: This feature can significantly reduce manual work by automating task creation and assignment, allowing team members to focus on more important tasks.

3. Update Name: Integration Enhancements
   Release Date: July 2024
   Description: Wealth Box enhanced its integration capabilities with other financial services software. This includes improved data syncing with accounting software and more robust integration with financial planning tools.
   Automation Value: These integration enhancements can save time by reducing the need for manual data entry and syncing between different software tools.

4. Update Name: Time-Saving Features
   Release Date: January 2025
   Description: Wealth Box introduced new features designed to save users time, including bulk editing capabilities, automated report generation, and a streamlined user interface.
   Automation Value: These time-saving features can reduce the amount of time spent on administrative tasks, allowing users to focus on more strategic activities.

Each of these updates provides significant automation value by reducing the need for manual work and freeing up time for more important tasks.
